issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi All,

Following is the setup

1) Host 1 -> DB+Backend
2) Host 2 -> UFS
3) Host 3 -> CC/SC
4) Host 4 -> NC
5) Host 5 -> Riak+Riak-CS
6) Edge network

Version

{code}
rpm -qa | grep euca
eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.141.140414gitef872be.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-4.0.0-0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-sos-plugins-0.1.5-0.el6.noarch
euca2ools-3.1.0-0.0.169.20140410git72569c33.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-common-java-libs-4.0.0-0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-cloud-4.0.0-0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6.x86_64
eucalyptus-admin-tools-4.0.0-0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6.noarch
{code}

Cannot run new instance even after having enough resources

{code}
[root@odc-d-06-02 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose ; euca-describe-addresses verbose
AVAILABILITYZONE	cloud4	10.104.1.213 arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud4:cluster:cc01/	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0004 / 0004   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0004 / 0004   1    256     5	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0004 / 0004   1    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0002 / 0002   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0002 / 0002   2    512    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0002 / 0002   2   1024    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0002 / 0002   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0002 / 0002   2   2048    10	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   2048    15	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   2   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0001   4   4096    30	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240	
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000	
ADDRESS	10.104.3.11	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.12	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.13	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.14	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.15	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.16	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.17	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.18	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.19	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.20	nobody	standard				
ADDRESS	10.104.3.21	nobody	standard
{code}

{code}
[root@odc-d-06-02 ~]# euca-run-instances -k sshlogin -t m1.large emi-a5524e70
euca-run-instances: error (InsufficientInstanceCapacity): Not enough resources (0 in  < 1): vm instances.
{code}

cloud-output.log on backend

{code}
2014-04-15 10:27:53  INFO | Triggering caching: imaging-worker-v1/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image.img.manifest.xml
2014-04-15 10:27:53  INFO | Found authorized clusters: [cc01]
2014-04-15 10:27:53  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 0
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | Triggering caching: imaging-worker-v1/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image.img.manifest.xml
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | Found authorized clusters: [cc01]
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 2
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 2
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | :1397583047732:Address:ADDRESS_STATE:TOP:Address 10.104.3.11 arn:aws:euare:000000000001:user/nobody available 0.0.0.0  AddressTransition system:unallocated->impending(true)
2014-04-15 10:30:47  INFO | :1397583047744:Address:ADDRESS_STATE:TOP:Address 10.104.3.11  AddressTransition unallocating:impending->unallocated(true)
2014-04-15 10:30:47  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-db48fb34:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[]}
2014-04-15 10:30:47  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-db48fb34:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[]}
2014-04-15 10:30:47  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-db48fb34:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[]}
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | Triggering caching: imaging-worker-v1/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image.img.manifest.xml
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | Found authorized clusters: [cc01]
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 1
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 1
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | :1397583049489:Address:ADDRESS_STATE:TOP:Address 10.104.3.11 arn:aws:euare:000000000001:user/nobody available 0.0.0.0  AddressTransition system:unallocated->impending(true)
2014-04-15 10:30:49  INFO | :1397583049502:Address:ADDRESS_STATE:TOP:Address 10.104.3.11  AddressTransition unallocating:impending->unallocated(true)
2014-04-15 10:30:49  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-b54737e2:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[]}

2014-04-15 10:30:49  WARN | Aborting resource token: ResourceToken:i-b54737e2:resources=TypedContext:{com.eucalyptus.util.TypedKey(NetworkResources)=[]}
2014-04-15 10:30:53  INFO | Triggering caching: imaging-worker-v1/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image.img.manifest.xml
2014-04-15 10:30:53  INFO | Found authorized clusters: [cc01]
2014-04-15 10:30:53  INFO | Availability: cc01 -> 0
{code}

Reproducible on will in the same topology and configuration. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Cheers!
Deependra
fields.summary: cannot run new instance due to insufficient capacity error message

comments.body: [~viglesias] pointed out that the network.json used for edge configuration was pointing at incorrect cluster name and after fixing it the issue disappeared
